main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed near Palmdale, California on September 13, 1955.
interesting points: The object had a flat top and bottom with rounded ends, exhaust was seen from the rear of the object, emitting a sound similar to a diesel roar with overtones of a loud afterburner, the observation lasted for 10 to 15 minutes, the conclusion suggested it could be a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: unidentified aerial object with flat top and bottom
